name: Arcane Worlds
description: A game inspired by classic Magic Carpet, with modern graphics and features. You play as a sorcerer, exploring mysterious worlds, changing them, discovering ancient secrets, creating new spells, fighting creatures and other mages, building and destroying as you please.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4, Athlon 64 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 6600, ATI X1300 DirectX: Version 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: 2 cores or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 class card or better
